welcome_message_body: "Welcome to L'Isle-d'Abeau, a charming city nestled in the beautiful French countryside. Known for its quaint streets, delicious cuisine, and rich history, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main and largest terminal at St-Exupéry Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a free option for basic internet access and a paid option for higher speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bron Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bron Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Grenoble-isere Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Grenoble-isere Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
